name: Holy Catch
description:
The game is still in development, don't buy it yet!

You have been sent on your way by your dear grandfather who knows a city where fishermen are desperately needed. Although he didn't tell you that the city also has a dark world.
You'll soon get to know some locals who will help you on your way to becoming a fisherman.
But when you think it's going well, it still goes wrong, the dark world is harder than you would expect.

You can fish in many different types of waters, each containing different types of fish such as sea, lake & river.
By using several types of rods and baits you can catch certain rare fish faster.

Will you survive?

You get your own house.
You can go to other worlds.
Various shops, such as a fish shop, weapon shop, and a bank.
The game contains various kinds of fish, they really exist.

At the beginning of the game you will see a short tutorial on how to play the game.

You can catch 10 different types of fish, we will add more later.
There are 5 different types of enemies, more will be added in the future.
The maps will also be expanded later so that you can discover more.
Plans have also been made to play this game CO-OP with your friends.
The game will also be made available for MacOS and Steamdeck at a later date.
